reference.shortdesc: A book change history contains events in the history of the book's creation and publishing lifecycle, including who wrote, reviewed, edited, and tested the book. It also specifies when these events took place

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The bookchangehistory element is a container that is a part of the metadata in a bookmap.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookchangehistory element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <bookmeta> <bookchangehistory> <reviewed> <started><year>2019</year><month>10</month></started> <completed><year>2020</year><month>01</month></completed> </reviewed> <edited> <person>Joe T. Editor</person> <completed><year>2020</year><month>03</month><day>15</day></completed> </edited> <tested> <organization>OASIS</organization> <completed><year>2020</year><month>04</month></completed> </tested> <approved> <organization>OASIS</organization> <completed><year>2020</year><month>05</month></completed> </approved> <bookevent> <bookeventtype name="Type of Major Event"/> <completed><year>2021</year></completed> </bookevent> </bookchangehistory> </bookmeta>
